scripts.dev: npm run example-html && npm run watch-css & npm run watch-js
scripts.build-example: npm run example-html && browserify -t reactify example.js -o ./example/main.js && stylus ./styl/example.styl --use ./node_modules/nib/lib/nib --out ./example/styles.css
scripts.build: npm run example-html && npm run build-css
scripts.dist: npm run build-css && browserify -t reactify --exclude react --exclude react-dom --standalone index.js -o ./dist/chartbuilder-ui.js
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.gh-pages: npm run build-example && git subtree push --prefix example origin gh-pages
